name: Shadow, the Hedgehog Fan Game
description:
Shadow the Hedgehog is collecting chaos emeralds for the notorious Dr. Eggman! But he must avoid G.U.N. agents and obstacles along the way. Can you get all the chaos emeralds? 

CONTROLS (Need Keyboard!):

ALT/SPACEBAR (L/R) - Chaos Spear

SHIFT (WHILE HOLDING L/R ARROW KEYS) - Spin Attack

ARROW KEYS - Move Around

This is a fan-game created for non-commercial, entertainment purposes. All the music, characters, and rights belong to Sega and the Sonic Franchise!
